name: TheCorrectYoga

”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Planning on learning yoga? Whether you are considering taking classes of yoga for beginners, or simply doing it on your own, at home, or through CD’s and books, there are some basic things of yoga that you should know about to fully understand and appreciate the benefits you are going to get, both physically and emotionally, as well as the knowledge that you’ll advantageously be gaining. Find out more about Yoga , from our daily Flash Briefings. Just Enable our Skill and …. Enjoy ! This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
